snippet: The death of the protester, coming after right-wing Hindus had pressured the government to cancel the event, is part of a string of escalating sectarian violence.
abstract: Hindu nationalists protest Muslim festival in southern Indian state of Karnataka; one Hindu dies in clashes.

byline.original: By DAVID BARSTOW and HARI KUMAR

lead_paragraph: The death of the protester, coming after right-wing Hindus had pressured the government to cancel the event, is part of a string of escalating sectarian violence.

headline.main: Hindu Nationalist Killed in Clashes at Indian Celebration of Muslim Ruler
headline.print_headline: Clashes Erupt, Killing One, as Hindu Nationalists Protest a Muslim Festival in India
